meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeri Anderson Leah Krinsky Karen Dauphin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #762.

div.div: Every clue was written by Harry Eisenberg, who had each category begin with the letter "H".

td.p: Jeri Anderson, a housewife from Las Vegas, Nevada
Leah Krinsky, a stand-up comic and actress originally from New York City
Karen Dauphin, a teacher from Burbank, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,000)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "H"
HOLIDAYS
THE HONEYMOONERS
HORTICULTURE
HIT TUNES
HINTS FROM HELOISE

Jeri
')

toggle('clue_J_5_4', 'clue_J_5_4_stuck', 'Heard here, Billboard says he\'ll always be known as "The Father of

Get out in that kitchen and rattle those pots and pans..."')

Rock & Roll":
"Get out in that kitchen and rattle those pots and pans /
Get out in that kitchen and rattle those pots and pans..."
